unnormalised: Edu-Tech Buzz: Scholarship Portals - Your Ticket to Dreams!
normalised: Edu-Tech Buzz: Scholarship Portals - Your Ticket to Dreams!

unnormalised: Struggling to fund your IIT dreams or that fancy MBA from IIM Ahmedabad? Don't sweat it! Scholarship portals are the new "jugaad" for Indian students. Think of them as digital treasure chests, brimming with opportunities.
normalised: Struggling to fund your I I T dreams or that fancy M B A from I I M Ahmedabad? Don't sweat it! Scholarship portals are the new "jugaad" for Indian students. Think of them as digital treasure chests, brimming with opportunities.

unnormalised: Websites like Buddy4Study and Vidya Lakshmi are helping lakhs of students, from Anjali in Patna wanting to pursue BSc Nursing to Rohan in Bangalore aiming for a Masters in Data Science. Forget endless library visits! These portals let you filter scholarships based on your caste, course, marks, even your parent's income (Rs. 5 lakhs or less, maybe?).
normalised: Websites like Buddy four Study and Vidya Lakshmi are helping lakhs of students, from Anjali in Patna wanting to pursue B S c Nursing to Rohan in Bangalore aiming for a Masters in Data Science. Forget endless library visits! These portals let you filter scholarships based on your caste, course, marks, even your parent's income (rupees five lakhs or less, maybe?).

unnormalised: The application process is often simpler than ordering a plate of momos at 2 AM. Just create a profile, upload your documents (Aadhaar, 10th marksheet etc.) and let the magic happen!
normalised: The application process is often simpler than ordering a plate of momos at two A M. Just create a profile, upload your documents (Aadhaar, tenth marksheet etcetera) and let the magic happen!

unnormalised: Remember that deadline though! Some scholarships close applications on 31/12/2023. Start hunting now before you miss out. Many new ones will open at 14:00 hrs on 01/01/2024. One thing to note - several portals might ask for a small registration fee (Rs. 100-Rs. 500), but it's often worth it for the potential reward! So, ditch that extra chai and paratha and invest in your future. Good luck! Final deadline for many scholarships is often 17:00 hrs on 15/08/2024.
normalised: Remember that deadline though! Some scholarships close applications on thirty first december two thousand and twenty three. Start hunting now before you miss out. Many new ones will open at fourteen hundred hours on first january two thousand and twenty four. One thing to note - several portals might ask for a small registration fee (rupees one hundred to rupees five hundred), but it's often worth it for the potential reward! So, ditch that extra chai and paratha and invest in your future. Good luck! Final deadline for many scholarships is often seventeen hundred hours on fifteenth august two thousand and twenty four.
